publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2697 Brian Adam:Supporting People—That the Parliament regrets that Aberdeen City Council has had to make £2.1 million of efficiency savings from its Supporting People budget; recognises that these efficiency savings are actually cuts which will affect the most vulnerable Aberdonians, and condemns the Scottish Executive for failing to provide Aberdeen with adequate resources to fund its Supporting People programme.

S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*, Stewart Stevenson*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mrs Nanette Milne*

S2M-2697 Brian Adam: Supporting People—That the Parliament regrets that Aberdeen City Council has had to make £2.1 million of efficiency savings from its Supporting People budget; recognises that these efficiency savings are actually cuts which will affect the most vulnerable Aberdonians, and condemns the Scottish Executive for failing to provide Aberdeen with adequate resources to fund its Supporting People programme. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, John Swinburne, Stewart Stevenson, Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shiona Baird, Eleanor Scott, Mr David Davidson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Patrick Harvie*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2697 Supporting People (lodged on 13 April 2005) Michael Matheson*
